en.current_game_achievement_count: Total achievements for the current/last played game.
en.current_game_achievement_unlocked_count: Unlocked achievements for the current/last played game.
en.requested_game_appid: App ID for the last requested game.
en.requested_game_name: Name for the last requested game.
en.requested_game_achievement_count: Total achievements for the last requested game.
en.requested_game_achievement_unlocked: Unlocked achievements for the last requested game.
en.requested_game_achievements: JSON payload of achievements for the last requested game.
